description: This table contains Home Health overtime single items from the LCP  (care plan) master file.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUMBER
columns.description: Contact number linked to the care plan.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: ID of the user who created the contact.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: LAST_EDIT_INST
columns.description: Instance at which the care plan was last edited.

columns.name: CTCT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.
